titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation of His Majesties gratious resolution for the reliefe of all such souldiers as are or shall be maymed in His Majesties service
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Oxford, this second day of May, in the ninteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
